vote.text: Amendment SA 3045 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3045 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Voinovich. (consideration: CR S4068; text: CR S4068) To make a technical correction.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3045 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Voinovich.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3045 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
